reviews.review_msg: Lecture is almost purely participation focused based on prior reading, and it is very important and exam questions are entirely depends on what is discussed in class. Read and attend. He is very nice, caring, and will answer questions patiently.
His accent is extremely difficult to understand. His tests are extremely long and unrealistic to complete within the time slot provided.
Dr. Balbinot did an amazing job at simplifying difficult concepts, and his exams were very fair. He also genuinely cared about his students and wanted them to do well.
